Believe you can and you're halfway there. — Theodore Roosevelt
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. — Steve Jobs
Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you. — Walt Whitman
It is never too late to be what you might have been. - George Eliot
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment. - Ralph Waldo Emerson
We are all broken, that's how the light gets in. - Ernest Hemingway
Appreciation is a wonderful thing. It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well. - Voltaire
Be yourself; everyone else is already taken. ― Oscar Wilde
Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe. ― Albert Einstein
Be the change that you wish to see in the world. ― Mahatma Gandhi
It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not. ― Andre Gide
Anything worth dying for is certainly worth living for. - Joseph Heller
It is the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting. ― Paulo Coelho
Even death has a heart. - Markus Zusak
Appreciate what you have now, because there may be no tomorrow. - Jodi Picoult
Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same. — Emily Brontë
It is nothing to die; it is dreadful not to live. — Victor Hugo
When you play the game of thrones you win or you die. — George R. R. Martin
In life, if you don't risk anything, you risk everything.
To be interesting - be interested.
Love is a verb… An action… To love is to do
Money often costs too much
Knowing and not doing, is as not knowing at all.
No one is in charge of your happiness but you.
A person cannot elevate themself by putting another person down
Just keep swimming - Dory
The future depends on what you do today. — Mahatma Gandhi
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going. — Sam Levenson
The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it. — Unknown
Dream big and dare to fail. — Norman Vaughan
The secret of getting ahead is getting started. — Mark Twain
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can. — Arthur Ashe
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts. — Winston Churchill
Believe in yourself and all that you are. — Christian D. Larson
Do one thing every day that scares you. — Eleanor Roosevelt
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals. — Zig Ziglar
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does. — William James
Either you run the day, or the day runs you. — Jim Rohn
Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart. — Roy T. Bennett
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations. — Unknown
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today. — Franklin D. Roosevelt
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take. — Wayne Gretzky
Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear. — George Addair
Opportunities don't happen. You create them. — Chris Grosser
The best way to predict the future is to create it. — Peter Drucker
I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse. — Florence Nightingale
Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value. — Albert Einstein
The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty. — Winston Churchill
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. — C.S. Lewis
If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else. — Booker T. Washington
Change your thoughts and you change your world. — Norman Vincent Peale
The mind is everything. What you think you become. — Buddha
Keep going. Be all in. — Bryan Hutchinson
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it. — Henry David Thoreau
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. — John D. Rockefeller
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. — Walt Disney
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great. — Zig Ziglar
Little by little, one travels far. — J.R.R. Tolkien
If you can dream it, you can do it. — Walt Disney
A year from now you may wish you had started today. — Karen Lamb
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be. — Ralph Waldo Emerson
Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail. — Charles Kettering
Do or do not. There is no try. — Yoda
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are. — Theodore Roosevelt
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it. — Confucius
Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor. — Truman Capote
It always seems impossible until it's done. — Nelson Mandela
A champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall. — Serena Williams
If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door. — Milton Berle
Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life. — Steve Jobs
Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence. — Vince Lombardi
The biggest risk is not taking any risk. — Mark Zuckerberg
If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done. — Unknown
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new. — Albert Einstein
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us. — Ralph Waldo Emerson
Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned. — Peter Marshall
Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.' — Mary Anne Radmacher
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm. — Winston Churchill
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions. — Dalai Lama

In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity. — Albert Einstein
The best revenge is massive success. — Frank Sinatra
Turn your wounds into wisdom. — Oprah Winfrey
Never regret anything that made you smile. — Mark Twain

Don't count the days, make the days count. — Muhammad Ali
The purpose of our lives is to be happy. — Dalai Lama

If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission. — Anonymous

Everything you can imagine is real. — Pablo Picasso
